cards.name: Academy Raider
cards.text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Whenever Academy Raider deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Accorder's Shield
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor: An Auriok shield is polished to a mirror finish even on the inside, enabling its bearer to watch foes ahead and behind.

cards.name: Accursed Spirit
cards.text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
cards.flavor: Many have heard the slither of dragging armor and the soft squelch of its voice. But only its victims ever meet its icy gaze.

cards.name: Act of Treason
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."
—Sarkhan Vol

cards.name: Advocate of the Beast
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on target Beast creature you control.
cards.flavor: "I am neither their drover nor their leader. To these majestic beasts, I am simply their herdmate and nothing more."

cards.name: Air Servant
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered."
—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

cards.name: Ajani's Chosen
cards.text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a 2/2 white Cat creature token onto the battlefield. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.
cards.flavor: "United, our roar will level mountains."

cards.name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
cards.text:
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
−3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.
−8: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is your life total.

cards.name: Altar's Reap
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor:
"Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible."
—Gorghul, augur of skulls

cards.name: Angelic Accord
cards.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: As demons are drawn to suffering, angels are drawn to acts of benevolence.

cards.name: Angelic Wall
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
cards.flavor:
"The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside."
—Tales of Ikarov the Voyager

cards.name: Archaeomancer
cards.text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

cards.name: Archangel of Thune
cards.text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor: Even the wicked have nightmares.

cards.name: Armored Cancrix
cards.flavor: Creatures displaced from time still turn up every year, stranded by the temporal disaster that once swept across Dominaria.

cards.name: Artificer's Hex
cards.text:
Enchant Equipment
At the beginning of your upkeep, if enchanted Equipment is attached to a creature, destroy that creature.
cards.flavor:
"Some treasures aren't worth finding, let alone stealing."
—Dack Fayden

cards.name: Auramancer
cards.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

cards.name: Awaken the Ancient
cards.text:
Enchant Mountain
Enchanted Mountain is a 7/7 red Giant creature with haste. It's still a land.
cards.flavor: Some days you stand to greet the horizon. Other days the horizon stands to greet you.

cards.name: Banisher Priest
cards.text: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
cards.flavor: "Oathbreaker, I cast you out!"

cards.name: Barrage of Expendables
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Barrage of Expendables deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Goblin generals don't distinguish between troops and ammunition.

cards.name: Battle Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control get +2/+0.
cards.flavor:
"One emitted a strange series of buzzing clicks and guttural commands, then clawed arms emerged from all of them. Is there no limit to their adaptations?"
—Hastric, Thunian scout

cards.name: Blessing
cards.text:
Enchant creature
{W}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Virtue can't survive without strength."
—Ardanna of the Angelic Council

cards.name: Blightcaster
cards.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Your flesh is unprepared for my gifts."

cards.name: Blood Bairn
cards.text: Sacrifice another creature: Blood Bairn gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The travelers were warned to watch out for children on the road.

cards.name: Blur Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)
cards.flavor: They move in a synchronized swarm, turning entire squads into heaps of bloody rags and bones in an instant.

cards.name: Bogbrew Witch
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Festering Newt or Bubbling Cauldron, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "The hardest thing is finding the right ingredients."

cards.name: Bonescythe Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor:
"Their appendages are sharper than our swords and quicker than our bows."
—Hastric, Thunian scout

cards.name: Bramblecrush
cards.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent.
cards.flavor: Nature abhors a lot of things.

cards.name: Brave the Elements
cards.text: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn. (They can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of that color.)

cards.name: Briarpack Alpha
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Briarpack Alpha enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"One of my greatest teachers."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

cards.name: Brindle Boar
cards.text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.
cards.flavor:
"Tell the cooks to prepare the fires. Tonight we feast!"
—Tolar Wolfbrother, Krosan tracker

cards.name: Bubbling Cauldron
cards.text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 4 life.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature named Festering Newt: Each opponent loses 4 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

cards.name: Burning Earth
cards.text: Whenever a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, Burning Earth deals 1 damage to that player.
cards.flavor:
"Your world is formed from the same power that wraps my burning hand around your throat."
—Shrazik, lavamancer

cards.name: Cancel
cards.text: Counter target spell.

cards.name: Canyon Minotaur
cards.flavor:
"We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side."
"Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?"
"Yes."
"So shouldn't we—"
"No."

cards.name: Capashen Knight
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
{1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: He protects Benalia as much with his reputation as with his force of arms.

cards.name: Celestial Flare
cards.text: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor:
"You were defeated the moment you declared your aggression."
—Gideon Jura

cards.name: Chandra's Outrage
cards.text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
cards.flavor: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

cards.name: Chandra's Phoenix
cards.text:
Flying
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Chandra, Pyromaster
cards.text:
+1: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. That creature can't block this turn.
0: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
−7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Charging Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Charging Griffin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Four claws, two wings, one beak, no fear.

cards.name: Child of Night
cards.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

cards.name: Claustrophobia
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
cards.flavor: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

cards.name: Clone
cards.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: He knows your strengths, your weaknesses, and the shape of that unfortunate birthmark on your backside.

cards.name: Colossal Whale
cards.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Whenever Colossal Whale attacks, you may exile target creature defending player controls until Colossal Whale leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

cards.name: Congregate
cards.text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."
—Song of All, canto 642

cards.name: Coral Merfolk
cards.flavor: Early sailors thought they were tricks of the mind or perhaps manatees. As more and more ships were classified as lost to "manatee attacks," the truth began to dawn.

cards.name: Corpse Hauler
cards.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice Corpse Hauler: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"He expects a reward, but the only piece of silver he'll get from me is my blade in his gut."
—Shelac, necromancer

cards.name: Corrupt
cards.text: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
cards.flavor: One misstep in the swamp and the evil that sleeps beneath will rise to find you.

cards.name: Cyclops Tyrant
cards.text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Cyclops Tyrant can't block creatures with power 2 or less.
cards.flavor: A single eye, blinded by rage.

cards.name: Dark Favor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.
cards.flavor: When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled.

cards.name: Dark Prophecy
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: When the bog ran short on small animals, Ekri turned to the surrounding farmlands.

cards.name: Darksteel Forge
cards.text: Artifacts you control have indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them. Artifact creatures with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)
cards.flavor:
"It is as if this world has been expecting our blessings."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

cards.name: Darksteel Ingot
cards.text:
Indestructible
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"It reflects the purity of Mirrodin-that-was."
—Koth of the Hammer

cards.name: Dawnstrike Paladin
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: She crushes darkness beneath her charger's hooves.

cards.name: Deadly Recluse
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

cards.name: Deathgaze Cockatrice
cards.text:
Flying
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor:
"Sometimes I come across a stone finger or foot and I know I'm in cockatrice territory."
—Rulak, bog guide

cards.name: Demolish
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land.
cards.flavor:
"This is why I hate settlements. They lull you into a false sense of security."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

cards.name: Devout Invocation
cards.text: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each creature tapped this way.
cards.flavor: A prayer to bring demons to their knees.

cards.name: Diabolic Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

cards.name: Dismiss into Dream
cards.text: Each creature your opponents control is an Illusion in addition to its other types and has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."
cards.flavor:
"You trust in the shadows of a breeze."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

cards.name: Disperse
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Gryffid found his way home and resumed life as best he could, constantly hiding his newfound fear of clouds.

cards.name: Divination
cards.text: Draw two cards.
cards.flavor:
"The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."
—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

cards.name: Divine Favor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
cards.flavor: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

cards.name: Domestication
cards.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.

cards.name: Doom Blade
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

cards.name: Door of Destinies
cards.text:
As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

cards.name: Dragon Egg
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Dragon Egg dies, put a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. It has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
cards.flavor: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

cards.name: Dragon Hatchling
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth."
—Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"It hurts more if you think about it."
—Hooks, Cabal torturer

cards.name: Elite Arcanist
cards.text:
When Elite Arcanist enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card from your hand.
{X}, {T}: Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. X is the converted mana cost of the exiled card.

cards.name: Elixir of Immortality
cards.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.
cards.flavor:
"Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect."
—Baron Sengir

cards.name: Elvish Mystic
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."
—Nissa Revane

cards.name: Encroaching Wastes
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.
cards.flavor: Every world is a work in progress, constantly reshaped by time, disasters, and even the powerful magic of Planeswalkers.

cards.name: Enlarge
cards.text: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able. (If a creature with trample would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

cards.name: Essence Scatter
cards.text: Counter target creature spell.
cards.flavor:
"What you attempt to pull from the Æther, I can spread onto the wind."
—Jace Beleren

cards.name: Festering Newt
cards.text: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.
cards.flavor: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.

cards.name: Fiendslayer Paladin
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Fiendslayer Paladin can't be the target of black or red spells your opponents control.

cards.name: Fireshrieker
cards.text:
Equipped creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Flames of the Firebrand
cards.text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.
cards.flavor:
"You're in luck. I brought enough to share."
—Chandra Nalaar

cards.name: Fleshpulper Giant
cards.text: When Fleshpulper Giant enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with toughness 2 or less.
cards.flavor: He doesn't hate small folk. He just likes the squishing sound they make.

cards.name: Fog
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
cards.flavor:
"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."
—Lord Hilneth

cards.name: Fortify
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

cards.name: Frost Breath
cards.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor: "I'll make ice chimes of your bones."

cards.name: Galerider Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have flying.
cards.flavor: Masters of adaptation, galeriders serve multiple purposes useful to the hive. When they're not patrolling their territories, their majestic wings serve to circulate cool air through the vast hive chambers.

cards.name: Garruk's Horde
cards.text:
Trample
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may cast the top card of your library if it's a creature card. (Do this only any time you could cast that creature card. You still pay the spell's costs.)

cards.name: Garruk, Caller of Beasts
cards.text:
+1: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
−3: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library."

cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Giant Spider
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor:
"It has a quickness about it that seems unnatural for its large size, yet its hunger is about right."
—Endril, Kalonian naturalist

cards.name: Gladecover Scout
cards.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor: "The forest is my cover and I hold it close. In such a tight embrace, there is no room for wickedness."

cards.name: Glimpse the Future
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"No simple coin toss can solve this riddle. You must think and choose wisely."
—Shai Fusan, archmage

cards.name: Gnawing Zombie
cards.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: On still nights you can hear its rotted teeth grinding tirelessly on scavenged bones.

cards.name: Goblin Diplomats
cards.text: {T}: Each creature attacks this turn if able.
cards.flavor: When you need to convey that special kind of message.

cards.name: Goblin Shortcutter
cards.text: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
cards.flavor: "I'm not running away! I'm figuring out the best routes."

cards.name: Griffin Sentinel
cards.text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.flavor: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

cards.name: Grim Return
cards.text: Choose target creature card in a graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor: The necromancer's touch strips away memory and loyalty, and only strength and malice remain.

cards.name: Groundshaker Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have trample. (If a Sliver you control would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

cards.name: Guardian of the Ages
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, if Guardian of the Ages has defender, it loses defender and gains trample.
cards.flavor:
"At my feet, invasions end."
—Statue inscription

cards.name: Haunted Plate Mail
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +4/+4.
{0}: Until end of turn, Haunted Plate Mail becomes a 4/4 Spirit artifact creature that's no longer an Equipment. Activate this ability only if you control no creatures.
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Hive Stirrings
cards.text: Put two 1/1 colorless Sliver creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Sliver young are sorted into clutches according to their potential and their future role. Human scholars can only guess how those are determined.

cards.name: Howl of the Night Pack
cards.text: Put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield for each Forest you control.
cards.flavor: The murderous horrors of Raven's Run are legendary, but even that haunted place goes quiet when the night wolves howl.

cards.name: Hunt the Weak
cards.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor: He who hesitates is lunch.

cards.name: Illusionary Armor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice Illusionary Armor.

cards.name: Imposing Sovereign
cards.text: Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: Some are born to rule. The rest are born to bow before them.

cards.name: Indestructibility
cards.text:
Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent has indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy that permanent. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)
cards.flavor: "By all means, keep trying."

cards.name: Into the Wilds
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"Wonders hide where the trees grow thickest."
—Mul Daya proverb

cards.name: Jace's Mindseeker
cards.text:
Flying
When Jace's Mindseeker enters the battlefield, target opponent puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. You may cast an instant or sorcery card from among them without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Jace, Memory Adept
cards.text:
+1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
0: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
−7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

cards.name: Kalonian Hydra
cards.text:
Trample
Kalonian Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Kalonian Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
cards.flavor: Even baloths fear its feeding time.

cards.name: Kalonian Tusker
cards.flavor:
"And all this time I thought we were tracking it."
—Juruk, Kalonian tracker

cards.name: Lava Axe
cards.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
cards.flavor: A strict upgrade over the cinder hatchet.

cards.name: Lay of the Land
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

cards.name: Lifebane Zombie
cards.text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
When Lifebane Zombie enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a green or white creature card from it and exile that card.

cards.name: Lightning Talons
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor:
"The victim was either clawed to death or struck by lightning. Possibly both."
—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

cards.name: Liliana of the Dark Realms
cards.text:
+1: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
−3: Target creature gets +X/+X or -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
−6: You get an emblem with "Swamps you control have ‘{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.'"

cards.name: Liliana's Reaver
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Whenever Liliana's Reaver deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Liturgy of Blood
cards.text: Destroy target creature. Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"You harbor such vast potential. It would be such a shame to let you die of old age."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

cards.name: Manaweft Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
cards.flavor:
"I see in their interconnectedness a strange embodiment of the natural order."
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

cards.name: Marauding Maulhorn
cards.text: Marauding Maulhorn attacks each combat if able unless you control a creature named Advocate of the Beast.
cards.flavor:
"It's not just you. Everyone makes it angry."
—Ardenoth, elvish nature advocate

cards.name: Mark of the Vampire
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor:
"My ‘condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it."
—Sorin Markov

cards.name: Master of Diversion
cards.text: Whenever Master of Diversion attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
cards.flavor: Choose your battles carefully. For example, avoid the big guy.

cards.name: Megantic Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control get +3/+3.
cards.flavor: Even the thrums, the lowliest of slivers, become deadly in its presence.

cards.name: Merfolk Spy
cards.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Whenever Merfolk Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals a card at random from his or her hand.

cards.name: Messenger Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Messenger Drake dies, draw a card.
cards.flavor: The more important the message, the larger the messenger.

cards.name: Millstone
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: Minds, like mountains, are never so grand and mighty that they can't be reduced to dust.

cards.name: Mind Rot
cards.text: Target player discards two cards.
cards.flavor:
"What a pity. You should have written it down."
—Liliana Vess

cards.name: Mindsparker
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Whenever an opponent casts a white or blue instant or sorcery spell, Mindsparker deals 2 damage to that player.

cards.name: Minotaur Abomination
cards.flavor:
"Look at that. Shuffling, wobbling, entrails placed haphazardly. It's shameful. Who would let that kind of work flap about for all to see?"
—Lestin, necromancer

cards.name: Molten Birth
cards.text: Put two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens onto the battlefield. Then flip a coin. If you win the flip, return Molten Birth to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Few can coax the creatures within the magma to be cooled and take form."
—Koth of the Hammer

cards.name: Mutavault
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.
cards.flavor: Some worlds possess a hidden core where life's essence constantly surges.

cards.name: Naturalize
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

cards.name: Negate
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
cards.flavor: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

cards.name: Nephalia Seakite
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
cards.flavor:
"Keep one eye on the cliff road or you may fall to your death. Keep one eye on the sky or your death may fall on you."
—Manfried Ulmach, Elgaud Master-at-Arms

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.text:
Flying
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
cards.flavor: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

cards.name: Nightwing Shade
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{B}: Nightwing Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"There is one hour of the night even we do not watch."
—Sedva, captain of the watch

cards.name: Oath of the Ancient Wood
cards.text: Whenever Oath of the Ancient Wood or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor: "Some gaze upon the forest and see trees. I see true power."

cards.name: Ogre Battledriver
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: Ogres are driven by passion, rage, and another ogre standing behind them with a whip.

cards.name: Opportunity
cards.text: Target player draws four cards.
cards.flavor: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
cards.flavor: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

cards.name: Path of Bravery
cards.text:
As long as your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain life equal to the number of attacking creatures.

cards.name: Pay No Heed
cards.text: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Out of this nettle, danger, we pluck this flower, safety."
—William Shakespeare, King Henry IV, Part I

cards.name: Phantom Warrior
cards.text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.
cards.flavor:
"The construction of a defense is not accomplished by adding bricks."
—Jace Beleren

cards.name: Pillarfield Ox
cards.flavor:
"You old, immobile clod! If I could stuff your doltish head with knowledge, I'd do it just so someone else could fully comprehend what your stubbornness has cost me!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

cards.name: Pitchburn Devils
cards.text: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: The ingenuity of goblins, the depravity of demons, and the smarts of sheep.

cards.name: Planar Cleansing
cards.text: Destroy all nonland permanents.

cards.name: Plummet
cards.text: Destroy target creature with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

cards.name: Predatory Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: No matter how much the slivers change, their collective might remains.

cards.name: Primeval Bounty
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Pyromancer's Gauntlet
cards.text: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control or a red planeswalker you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.
cards.flavor: An inferno is just a gesture away.

cards.name: Quag Sickness
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.
cards.flavor: The dread gases didn't kill Farbid. But as he lay in the muck, miserable and helpless, watching ghouls and rats advance on him, he wished they had.

cards.name: Quicken
cards.text:
The next sorcery card you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. (It can be cast any time you could cast an instant.)
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: A skilled Izzet chronarch can carry out an epic vendetta between the fall of one hourglass grain and the next.

cards.name: Ranger's Guile
cards.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor:
"You don't survive in the wild by standing in plain sight."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

cards.name: Ratchet Bomb
cards.text:
{T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb.
{T}, Sacrifice Ratchet Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Ratchet Bomb.

cards.name: Regathan Firecat
cards.flavor: It stalks the Regathan highlands, leaving behind melted snow, scorched earth, and the charred corpses of would-be temple robbers.

cards.name: Ring of Three Wishes
cards.text:
Ring of Three Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.
{5}, {T}, Remove a wish counter from Ring of Three Wishes: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Rise of the Dark Realms
cards.text: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor:
"For every living person there are generations of dead. Which realm would you rather rule?"
—Liliana Vess

cards.name: Rod of Ruin
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: The good news is it's so simple a goblin could use it. The bad news is it's so simple a goblin could use it.

cards.name: Rootwalla
cards.text: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
cards.flavor: They make terrible pets . . . unless you don't like your other pets.

cards.name: Rumbling Baloth
cards.flavor: In the dim light beneath the vast trees of Deepglade, baloths prowl in search of prey. Their guttural calls are more felt than heard, but their attack scream carries for miles.

cards.name: Sanguine Bond
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
cards.flavor:
"Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed."
—Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

cards.name: Savage Summoning
cards.text:
Savage Summoning can't be countered.
The next creature card you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. That spell can't be countered. That creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Scavenging Ooze
cards.text: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

cards.name: Scourge of Valkas
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Scourge of Valkas or another Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of Dragons you control.
{R}: Scourge of Valkas gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Scroll Thief
cards.text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Kapsho merfolk have infiltrated fortresses as remote as the desert citadel in Sunari in their relentless quest for arcane knowledge.

cards.name: Seacoast Drake
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Seacoast drakes have been known to follow ships for hundreds of miles, waiting to snap up garbage, bait, and the occasional sailor.

cards.name: Seismic Stomp
cards.text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
cards.flavor:
"It is not in me to tread lightly."
—Ryda, geomancer

cards.name: Sengir Vampire
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.
cards.flavor: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

cards.name: Sensory Deprivation
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
cards.flavor: They call it "stitcher's anesthesia," a spell to deaden the senses while the mad doctors begin their grisly work.

cards.name: Sentinel Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
cards.flavor: Through its watchful gaze, all slivers may see.

cards.name: Seraph of the Sword
cards.text:
Flying
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Seraph of the Sword.
cards.flavor: "Only when my sword lies idle shall I rejoice."

cards.name: Serra Angel
cards.text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.flavor: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

cards.name: Shadowborn Apostle
cards.text:
A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle.
{B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Shadowborn Demon
cards.text:
Flying
When Shadowborn Demon enters the battlefield, destroy target non-Demon creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are fewer than six creature cards in your graveyard, sacrifice a creature.

cards.name: Shimmering Grotto
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.

cards.name: Shiv's Embrace
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: When you see the world as a dragon sees it, everything looks fit to burn.

cards.name: Shivan Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

cards.name: Shock
cards.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Show of Valor
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Cowards watch. Heroes act.

cards.name: Shrivel
cards.text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Do not weep for the frail. Their time couldn't have been that far off."
—Nathrac, plaguesower

cards.name: Siege Mastodon
cards.flavor:
"The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!"
—General Avitora

cards.name: Silence
cards.text: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn. (Spells cast before this resolves are unaffected.)
cards.flavor:
"Take a quiet moment to reflect on your sins."
—Cleph, Order of Redeemed Souls

cards.name: Sliver Construct
cards.flavor: Slivers destroy those who come close to the Skep, the central hive. Shards of torn metal litter the ground as a warning to any artificers inquisitive about the hive's inner workings.

cards.name: Smelt
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.
cards.flavor:
"Looks like that wasn't darksteel after all."
—Koth of the Hammer

cards.name: Solemn Offering
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
cards.flavor:
"You will be reimbursed for your donation.""The reimbursement is spiritual."
—Temple signs

cards.name: Soulmender
cards.text: {T}: You gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."

cards.name: Spell Blast
cards.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)
cards.flavor: "Perhaps you could try throwing a rock? That might be better suited to your intellect."

cards.name: Sporemound
cards.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

cards.name: Staff of the Death Magus
cards.text: Whenever you cast a black spell or a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: A symbol of ambition in ruthless times.

cards.name: Staff of the Flame Magus
cards.text: Whenever you cast a red spell or a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: A symbol of passion in indifferent times.

cards.name: Staff of the Mind Magus
cards.text: Whenever you cast a blue spell or an Island enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: A symbol of sagacity in bewildering times.

cards.name: Staff of the Sun Magus
cards.text: Whenever you cast a white spell or a Plains enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: A symbol of conviction in uncertain times.

cards.name: Staff of the Wild Magus
cards.text: Whenever you cast a green spell or a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: A symbol of ferocity in oppressive times.

cards.name: Steelform Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control get +0/+1.
cards.flavor:
"Though the slivers may sometimes resemble us, they are not human. Anyone who fights them must remember this."
—Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

cards.name: Stonehorn Chanter
cards.text: {5}{W}: Stonehorn Chanter gains vigilance and lifelink until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap. Damage dealt by it also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: With the Stonehorn, piety and power are one.

cards.name: Striking Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor: You're too busy recoiling in fear to realize that it's already hit you.

cards.name: Strionic Resonator
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")
cards.flavor: Its tines cannot be rung by mere physical force. Only magic of great power can start its eldritch resonance.

cards.name: Suntail Hawk
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor:
"They are the finest companions in the realm. Swift, clever, and easily trained to hunt intruders."
—Almira, falconer

cards.name: Syphon Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have lifelink. (Damage dealt by a Sliver creature you control also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: When the hive must feed, every appendage becomes an additional mouth.

cards.name: Tenacious Dead
cards.text: When Tenacious Dead dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.
cards.flavor: Raising the bones of Hekjek the Mad proved far easier than getting them to lie back down.

cards.name: Thorncaster Sliver
cards.text: Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
cards.flavor: Every inch of a sliver's body is a potential claw, appendage, or projectile.

cards.name: Thunder Strike
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor: Lightning reflexes, thunderous might.

cards.name: Tidebinder Mage
cards.text: When Tidebinder Mage enters the battlefield, tap target red or green creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Tidebinder Mage.

cards.name: Time Ebb
cards.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor:
"Yesterday you were just a figment of your master's imagination. I liked you better then."
—Shai Fusan, archmage

cards.name: Tome Scour
cards.text: Target player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: "I hope none of those were important!"

cards.name: Trading Post
cards.text:
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life.
{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a 0/1 white Goat creature token onto the battlefield.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

cards.name: Trained Condor
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Trained Condor attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"They're smart enough to understand that war means lots of carrion."
—Griv, condor rider

cards.name: Traumatize
cards.text: Target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded down, into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: He was left with just enough memory to understand what he had lost.

cards.name: Trollhide
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature." (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

cards.name: Undead Minotaur
cards.flavor:
"The work that went into creating this magnificent specimen. Horrific, deadly, well-balanced. Not all necromancers do elegant work like this."
—Lestin, necromancer

cards.name: Vampire Warlord
cards.text: Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Vampire Warlord. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
cards.flavor: "How can you serve me? By dying."

cards.name: Vastwood Hydra
cards.text:
Vastwood Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When Vastwood Hydra dies, you may distribute a number of +1/+1 counters equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Vastwood Hydra among any number of creatures you control.

cards.name: Verdant Haven
cards.text:
Enchant land
When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

cards.name: Vial of Poison
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice Vial of Poison: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: There are worse ways to die, but not many.

cards.name: Vile Rebirth
cards.text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Grave robbers digging down cautiously listen for anything digging up.

cards.name: Volcanic Geyser
cards.text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"The common folk call it the breaking of the crust or the spilling of fire. Geomancers call it target practice."
—Ryda, geomancer

cards.name: Voracious Wurm
cards.text: Voracious Wurm enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the amount of life you've gained this turn.
cards.flavor: Shepherds in Kalonia know it's better to let sheep roam than have them be trapped when the wurms are feeding.

cards.name: Wall of Frost
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor:
"I have seen countless petty warmongers gaze on it for a time before turning away."
—Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

cards.name: Wall of Swords
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
cards.flavor:
"When I said we needed more swords to protect the realm, this was not quite what I had in mind."
—Olander, tactician of the Northern Verge

cards.name: Warden of Evos Isle
cards.text:
Flying
Creature spells with flying you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: On Evos Isle, the swift and formidable aven enforce the will of the ruling sphinxes.

cards.name: Water Servant
cards.text:
{U}: Water Servant gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{U}: Water Servant gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"This creature has innate perceptiveness. It knows when to rise and when to vanish into the tides."
—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

cards.name: Wild Guess
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Wild Guess, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: No guts, no glory.

cards.name: Wild Ricochet
cards.text: You may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor:
"May your day never match your expectations."
—Scriptus Fleen, flectomancer

cards.name: Windreader Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."

cards.name: Windstorm
cards.text: Windstorm deals X damage to each creature with flying.
cards.flavor:
"We don't like interlopers and thieves cluttering our skies."
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

cards.name: Witchstalker
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Whenever an opponent casts a blue or black spell during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Witchstalker.

cards.name: Woodborn Behemoth
cards.text: As long as you control eight or more lands, Woodborn Behemoth gets +4/+4 and has trample. (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

cards.name: Wring Flesh
cards.text: Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"You shouldn't be so attached to something as fragile as flesh."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

cards.name: Xathrid Necromancer
cards.text: Whenever Xathrid Necromancer or another Human creature you control dies, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: "My commands shall echo forever in their dusty skulls."

cards.name: Young Pyromancer
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a 1/1 red Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.

cards.name: Zephyr Charge
cards.text: {1}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"All armies prefer high ground to low and sunny places to dark."
—Sun Tzu, Art of War, trans. Giles
